tool_description: This is an API that'll take any block of text and summarize it.  It works best with longer-form text more than 3 sentences long.
name: Text Summarizer
title: Text Summarizer

api_list.name: by POST
api_list.description: This endpoint is used to summarize text provided in the query parameter named 'body'
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-summarizer10.p.rapidapi.com/summarize"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-summarizer10.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://text-summarizer10.p.rapidapi.com/summarize"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-summarizer10.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
